REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0199 reute b f BC-NEW-DUTCH-ADVANCES-TO 03-20 0074

TEXT.TITLE: NEW DUTCH ADVANCES TOTAL FOUR BILLION GUILDERS
TEXT.BODY: The Dutch Central Bank said it has accepted bids totalling 4.00 billion guilders at tender this morning for new five-day special advances at 5.3 pct for the period March 20 to 25. Subscriptions to 250 mln guilders were fully met, amounts above 250 mln at 30 pct. The new facility replaces old 11-day advances totalling 6.5 billion guilders at the same rate. REUTER
